data.name: Programación 3
data.about: Página web de la asignatura Programación 3.

data.name: Facebook - Grupo Programación 3
data.about: Los objetivos del grupo son: Compartir materiales relacionados con la asignatura, Plantear y resolver dudas de práctico y teórico, Comentarios e información.

data.name: C11 Standard for the C Programming Language
data.about: The current standard for the C programming language. It replaces the previous C standard, informally known as C99.

data.name: Aprenda lenguaje ANSI C como si estuviera en Primero
data.about: En estos apuntes se describe de forma abreviada la sintaxis del lenguaje Comentarios. No se trata de aprender a programar en C, sino más bien de presentar los recursos o las posibilidades que el C pone a disposición de los programadores.

data.name: The C Library Reference Guide
data.about: This guide provides a useful look at the standard C programming language. This guide is divided into two sections. The first part, 'Language', is an analysis of the syntax and the environment. The second part, 'Library', is a list of the functions available in the standard C library.

data.name: C data types
data.about: In the C programming language, data types refers to an extensive system for declaring variables of different types.

data.name: IEEE 754 Converter
data.about: Convert between the decimal representation of numbers (like 1.02) and the binary format used by all modern CPUs (IEEE 754 floating point).

data.name: Washington's University Course about Design and Analysis of Algorithms
data.about: Techniques for design of efficient algorithms. Methods for showing lower bounds on computational complexity. Particular algorithms for sorting, searching, set manipulation, arithmetic, graph problems, pattern matching.

data.name: Introduction to Algorithms Course (MIT)
data.about: This course provides an introduction to mathematical modeling of computational problems. It covers the common algorithms, algorithmic paradigms, and data structures used to solve these problems. The course emphasizes the relationship between algorithms and programming, and introduces basic performance measures and analysis techniques for these problems.
